section.heading: Action on plan of merger by constituent statutory trust.

para.text: A plan of merger shall be consented to by all trustees and all beneficial owners of a constituent statutory trust.
After a merger is approved, and at any time before a filing is made under § 29-1207.04, a constituent statutory trust may amend the plan or abandon the planned merger:
As provided in the plan; and
Except as prohibited by the plan, with the same consent as was required to approve the plan.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 703 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act.
